The [Professional Certificate in Data Science](https://www.edx.org/professional-certificate/harvardx-data-science) , offered by Harvard University on EdX comprises of 9 courses that impart skills in R, Statistics, and the basics of machine learning. The nine courses are:

-   Data Science: R Basics
-   Data Science: Visualization
-   Data Science: Probability
-   Data Science: Inference and Modeling
-   Data Science: Productivity Tools
-   Data Science: Wrangling
-   Data Science: Linear Regression
-   Data Science: Machine Learning
-   Data Science: Capstone

My final certificate is available on this \[link\](https://credentials.edx.org/credentials/6f9f9fb5eee84a4c9ba3d62f4ded231b/) <https://credentials.edx.org/credentials/6f9f9fb5eee84a4c9ba3d62f4ded231b/>

The URL for the course website is <https://www.edx.org/professional-certificate/harvardx-data-science>
